mapper.insert: insert into eap_employee (eem_id, ee_id, name, phone_num, number, remark1, remark2, grade, college, statistical_time, eap_advisory_duration, eap_advisory_times, total_advisory_duration, total_advisory_times, tag, create_time, update_time, delete_time, is_enable, is_delete) values (#{eemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statisticalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eapAdvisoryDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eapAdvisoryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalAdvisoryDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalAdvisoryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT})

update eap_employee set ee_id = #{eeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=BIGINT}, college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, statistical_time = #{statisticalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, eap_advisory_duration = #{eapAdvisoryDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, eap_advisory_times = #{eapAdvisoryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_advisory_duration = #{totalAdvisoryDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_advisory_times = #{totalAdvisoryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT} where eem_id = #{eemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0

ee_id = #{eeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=BIGINT},
college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
statistical_time = #{statisticalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
eap_advisory_duration = #{eapAdvisoryDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
eap_advisory_times = #{eapAdvisoryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_advisory_duration = #{totalAdvisoryDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
total_advisory_times = #{totalAdvisoryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where eem_id = #{eemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0
mapper.select: select ee_id from eap_employee inner join member on member.mobile_phone=eap_employee.phone_num where member.mid=#{mid} and eap_employee.is_enable=0 and eap_employee.is_delete=0
mapper.update: update eap_employee set is_delete=1 where ee_id=#{eeId} and is_delete=0
mapper.select:
SELECT eem.*, ifnull(t6.advisory_count,0) as advisory_count, ifnull(t6.testing_count,0) as testing_count, ifnull(t6.update_count,0) as update_count, ifnull(t6.search_count,0) as search_count, ifnull(t6.order_count,0) as order_count, t6.mid as mid FROM ( SELECT t4.*, t5.testing_count, t5.mobile_phone FROM ( SELECT t3.mid AS mid, ( SELECT count(*) FROM member_advisory ma WHERE ma.mid = t3.mid AND ma.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY t3.mid ) AS advisory_count, ( SELECT count(*) FROM member_update mu WHERE mu.mid = t3.mid AND mu.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY t3.mid ) AS update_count, ( SELECT count(*) FROM ub_search_words usw WHERE usw.mid = t3.mid AND usw.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY t3.mid ) AS search_count, ( SELECT count(*) FROM service_order so WHERE so.mid = t3.mid AND so.is_delete = 0 and so.ee_id=#{eeId} GROUP BY t3.mid ) AS order_count FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT (member.mid) mid FROM member, eap_employee WHERE eap_employee.ee_id = #{eeId} AND member.mobile_phone = eap_employee.phone_num ) t3 ) t4, ( SELECT t2.mid, IFNULL(t2.testing_jump_count, 0) + IFNULL(t2.testing_result_count, 0) AS testing_count, t2.mobile_phone FROM ( SELECT t1.mid AS mid, t1.mobile_phone, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(*), 0) FROM testing_result_for_member trm WHERE trm.mid = t1.mid AND trm.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY t1.mid ) AS testing_jump_count, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(*), 0) FROM testing_score_amount tsa WHERE tsa.mid = t1.mid AND tsa.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY t1.mid ) AS testing_result_count FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT (member.mid) mid, member.mobile_phone FROM member, eap_employee WHERE eap_employee.ee_id = #{eeId} AND member.mobile_phone = eap_employee.phone_num AND eap_employee.is_delete = 0 AND member.is_delete = 0 ) t1 ) t2 ) t5 WHERE t5.mid = t4.mid ) t6 RIGHT JOIN eap_employee eem ON t6.mobile_phone = eem.phone_num WHERE eem.is_delete = 0 AND eem.ee_id = #{eeId}
and (eem.name like concat('%',#{words},'%') or eem.phone_num like concat('%',#{words},'%') or eem.number like concat('%',#{words},'%') )
AND eem.create_time >= #{startTime}
AND eem.create_time <= #{endTime}
AND eem.grade = #{grade}
AND eem.college = #{college}
AND eem.is_enable = #{isEnable}
order by eem.grade asc
order by eem.grade desc
order by t6.order_count asc
order by t6.order_count desc
order by t6.advisory_count asc
order by t6.advisory_count desc
order by t6.update_count asc
order by t6.update_count desc
order by t6.search_count asc
order by t6.search_count desc
order by t6.testing_count asc
order by t6.testing_count desc
order by eem.is_enable asc
order by eem.is_enable desc
order by eem.tag asc
order by eem.tag desc
order by eem.grade desc
limit #{pageStartNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT DISTINCT (college) FROM eap_employee WHERE ee_id = #{eeId} AND is_delete = 0 and college is not null and college <> ''
SELECT DISTINCT (grade) FROM eap_employee WHERE ee_id = #{eeId} AND is_delete = 0 and grade is not null and grade <> '' order by grade
